question: National Institute of Rural Development and Panchayati Raj (NIRDPR) has collaborated with the regional office of which global organisation to train community leaders?
explanation:
The National Institute of Rural Development and Panchayati Raj (NIRDPR) has collaborated with UNICEF Hyderabad Field Office.
The Communication Resource Unit (CRU) of NIRDPR and UNICEF, Hyderabad field office have developed an online programme for Panchayati Raj Institutions, Self-help Groups (SHG), National Service Scheme (NSS) officials and volunteers for practising sanitation and social measures.
